metadata.description: The regional hub network to which this regional spoke will peer to.

The spokes's regional affinity, must be the same as the hub's location. All resources tied to this spoke will also be homed in this region. The network team maintains this approved regional list which is a subset of zones with Availability Zone support.
Flow Logs are enabled by default, if for some reason they cause conflicts with flow log policies already in place in your subscription, you can disable them by passing 'false' to this parameter.

resources.name: [variables('routeTableName')]
resources.comments: Next hop to regional hub Azure Firewall

resources.name: [concat('nsg-', variables('clusterVNetName'), '-management-ops')]
resources.comments: NSG blocking all inbound traffic other than port 22 for jumpbox access.

properties.description: Allow our Azure Bastion users in.

resources.name: [concat('nsg-', variables('clusterVNetName'), '-system-nodepools')]
resources.comments: NSG on all AKS system nodepools. Feel free to constrict further both inbound and outbound!

properties.description: No SSH access allowed to nodes.

resources.name: [concat('nsg-', variables('clusterVNetName'), '-is-nodepools')]
resources.comments: NSG on the AKS in-scope nodepools. Feel free to constrict further both inbound and outbound!

properties.description: No SSH access allowed to nodes.

resources.name: [concat('nsg-', variables('clusterVNetName'), '-oos-nodepools')]
resources.comments: NSG on the AKS out-of-scope nodepools. Feel free to constrict further both inbound and outbound!

properties.description: No SSH access allowed to nodes.

resources.name: [concat('nsg-', variables('clusterVNetName'), '-privatelinkendpoints')]
resources.comments: Default NSG on the private link subnet. No traffic should be allowed out, and only Tcp/443 in. Key Vault and Container Registry is expected to be accessed in here.

resources.name: [concat('nsg-', variables('clusterVNetName'), '-aksilbs')]
resources.comments: Default NSG on the AKS ILB subnet. Feel free to constrict further!

resources.name: [concat('nsg-', variables('clusterVNetName'), '-appgw')]
resources.comments: NSG on the App Gateway subnet.

properties.description: Allow ALL web traffic into 443. (If you wanted to allow-list specific IPs, this is where you'd list them.)

resources.name: [concat('nsg-', variables('clusterVNetName'), '-acragents')]
resources.comments: NSG on the ACR docker subnet.

resources.name: Apply-Subscription-Spoke-PipUsage-Policies-01
resources.comments: Deploys subscription-level policy related to spoke deployment.

resources.name: [guid(variables('policyResourceIdNoPublicIpsInVnet'), variables('clusterVnetResourceId'))]
resources.comments: Cluster VNet should never have a NIC with a public IP.

properties.displayName: [concat('Network interfaces in [', variables('clusterVNetName'), '] should not have public IPs')]
properties.description: Cluster VNet should never have a NIC with a public IP.

nonComplianceMessages.message: No NICs with public IPs are allowed in the regulated environment spoke.

resources.name: [variables('clusterVNetName')]
resources.comments: 65,536 (-reserved) IPs available to the workload, split across four subnets for AKS, one for App Gateway, and two for management.

resources.name: [variables('toHubPeeringName')]
resources.comments: Peer to regional hub.

resources.name: [concat('CreateHubTo', variables('clusterVNetName'), 'Peer')]
resources.comments: Sub incremental deployment to perform hub-to-spoke peering

resources.name: [variables('acrPrivateDnsZonesName')]
resources.comments: Enabling Azure Container Registry Private Link on vnet.

resources.name: [concat('to_', variables('clusterVNetName'))]
resources.comments: Enabling cluster vnet private zone DNS lookup - used by cluster vnet for direct DNS queries (ones not proxied via the hub).

resources.name: [concat('to_', variables('hubNetworkName'))]
resources.comments: Enabling hub vnet private zone DNS lookup for ACR - used by azure firewall's dns proxy.

resources.name: [variables('aksPrivateDnsZonesName')]
resources.comments: Enabling AKS Private Link on vnet.

resources.name: [concat('to_', variables('hubNetworkName'))]
resources.comments: Enabling hub vnet private zone DNS lookup for private AKS - used by azure firewall's dns proxy.

resources.name: [variables('akvPrivateDnsZonesName')]
resources.comments: Enabling Azure Key Vault Private Link support.

resources.name: [concat('to_', variables('clusterVNetName'))]
resources.comments: Enabling Azure Key Vault Private Link on cluster vnet.

resources.name: [concat('to_', variables('hubNetworkName'))]
resources.comments: Enabling hub vnet private zone DNS lookup for ACR - used by azure firewall's dns proxy.

resources.name: [variables('primaryClusterPipName')]
resources.comments: Used as primary entry point for workload. Expected to be assigned to an Azure Application Gateway.
